ygData.msgSnippet: Predicons ,the name made Lunarpine druel, I know that name, and for some odd reason dislike it very much, must be what the last rabbit I caught felt like.

"Predicons",the name made Lunarpine druel,"I know that name, and for some
odd reason dislike it very much, must be what the last rabbit I caught felt
like."
The mysterious wolf looked upon the aquaintance before him,"I believe I may
have a purpose after all.". He still couldn't shake the fealing that with or
without his help this war would last a very long time.
----- Original Message -----
From: Logo morph <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 25, 2000 8:19 PM
Subject: Re: The great North


> ::Shadow Wing::
> "I speak the truth.  The others I am speaking of are Maximals.  They are
> bots very much like us.  They serve the Matrix.  We work for the purpose
of
> good itself.  We defend others aginst the Predacons and a new threat, the
> New Comers.  They both wish to use this planets resources and destroy all
> the life on it for thier own will and care nothing for anyone but
> themselves.  They kill for pleasure and nothing else." She sighed and
looked
> into his almost hypnotic eyes.
> "This war is sensless and painful for all. But I'd be honored if you'd
join
> me and fight with me for what is right and just."
> She smiled at him.  She kind of liked him a little.
> "It's not easy doing the right thing. Could even get you yourself killed.
> But, I know that it would be worth it to die doing what is right.  If you
> decide not to join me, I will understand.  The right thing isn't always
the
> easiest thing to be doing."
>
>
>
> -------Original Message--------
> >From: cyberwolf4@...
> >Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
> >To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
> >Subject: Re: The great North
>
> >"Yes I see in your eyes you are sincere. Like me you seek the night
> >your grace could easily lure anyone into a false sense of trust but
> >somehow I know otherwise. Who are these beings you speak of? are they
> >robots like us? " Lunarpine follows his new aquaintance eager to
> >learn all he can before deciding his final fate.
